song.title: Fish Light
song.info:
Fish Light el blanco [fulcrum] 5:32
After a bit of a lull and constant interruptions by real-life(TM), finally, another tune. Greetz to fulcrum, coplan, others etc. I really focused on VSTi usage in this one. Pretty much all the instruments (except for the drums) are VSTis. I really enjoy using the Angular Momentum Additive Table Synth by Laif Oddson & Thomas Weber. Just love those delicious sounds it puts out. If only it didn't crash madtracker all the time! I mainly used some presets with a few minor tweaks. The piano is Steinberg's "The Grand" run through MT2's flanger to make it fit in with the trance sound. The drums are all samples I had lying around.
